scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross in the center. He is depicted with a loincloth and a halo. To his left stands the Virgin Mary, dressed in blue and praying. To his right stands another female figure, possibly Mary Magdalene, also in prayer. The background is a green landscape with some stylized bushes and a blue sky. The figures are rendered in a stylized, medieval manner.
